context.p: Use this query for generating lists of pitch values for phones or strings of phones identified through user-determined criteria. For example, these include single phones (e.g. [a]), groups of phone (e.g. {stop}), or sequences of phones (e.g. [an]). The user can also perform these tasks on strings defined in terms of syllables, word, and word groups.

step.cmd: Select Query PitchListing from the window menu.

step.note: This query requires that records have associated TextGrids. See and
step.cmd: Choose the sessions to be included in the query and fill in the query form as required. You may choose to search either the IPA Target or IPA Actual tiers and may configure for the query. Click Next.
While the query is being performed, pitch data will be printed to the Buffers window. A new buffer will be created for each session being queried (i.e., there will be one table per session.)
